function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal access to wearables due to cost and technological complexity","Impact":"Limited access to health-monitoring technology, exacerbating healthcare inequalities","Mitigation":"Develop affordable and user-friendly wearable technology, and ensure equal distribution across socioeconomic groups","Technologies":"Affordable wearable devices, user-friendly interfaces, distribution planning","People":"Socioeconomically disadvantaged individuals","Owner":"Tech companies, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Dependence on wearables for healthcare access","Impact":"Overreliance on wearables may lead to neglect of traditional healthcare methods and face-to-face appointments","Mitigation":"Create guidelines for balanced use of wearables and traditional healthcare, and promote integration of both approaches","Technologies":"Guideline development, integration platforms for healthcare data","People":"Healthcare practitioners, patients","Owner":"Healthcare regulatory authorities, technology developers"},{"Description":"Privacy and data security risks with wearable technology","Impact":"Risk of sensitive health data being compromised, leading to privacy violations and potential misuse","Mitigation":"Implement strong data security measures, transparent privacy policies, and user consent mechanisms","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, privacy policy frameworks","People":"Wearable users, healthcare providers","Owner":"Technology companies, data security experts"}]}
